snippet: This morning was the opening of an exhibition, "Impact: Fifty Years of the C.F.D.A.," that celebrates 50 years of American fashion at the Museum at the Fashion Institute of Technology.
abstract: This morning was the opening of an exhibition, "Impact: Fifty Years of the C.F.D.A.," that celebrates 50 years of American fashion at the Museum at the Fashion Institute of Technology.
lead_paragraph: As the New York Fashion Week fall collections get under way, you already have the sense that designers are becoming a little punchy from lack of sleep. This morning, at the opening of an exhibition celebrating 50 years of American fashion at the Museum at the Fashion Institute of Technology, Diane Von Furstenberg was a regular Henny Youngman as she made remarks introducing the show.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Council of Fashion Designers of America
